title: IoT Based Smart Irrigation System for Precision Farming. Team Krishi-Shakti

tasks.task: Present a problem statement for a smart irrigation system.
subtasks: Explain the problem of water scarcity in agriculture.
Describe traditional irrigation methods and their inefficiencies.
Introduce the smart irrigation system and its benefits.
Explain the components of the robotic car used in the system.
Describe the sensors and their functions in the irrigation system.
Explain the role of ESP826 in controlling the car and sensors.
Describe the IoT Blink platform and AI analysis.
Explain the user interface provided to farmers.
Describe the mechanism for motor control and fertilizer pump.
Mention the GPRS sensor for car location.
Mention the preparation of a video demonstration.
